tool.name: tool_1

param.name: TCA
param.dialogReference:
Flow Accumulation

Grid, output

The flow accumulation, a.k.a. Total Catchment Area (TCA)

param.name: PREPROCESSING
param.dialogReference:
Preprocessing

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Fill Sinks (Wang & Liu)

[1] Sink Removal

Default: 0

param.name: FLOW_ROUTING
param.dialogReference:
Flow Routing

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Deterministic 8

[1] Rho 8

[2] Braunschweiger Reliefmodell

[3] Deterministic Infinity

[4] Multiple Flow Direction

[5] Multiple Triangular Flow Direction

[6] Multiple Maximum Downslope Gradient Based Flow Direction

Default: 0

tool.summary: This is a simple to use one step tool to derive flow accumulation from a Digital Terrain Model. It includes a preprocessing followed by a call to 'Flow Accumulation (Top-Down) exposing only the most important options.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
